welcome_message_1:
You're about to join a world of prayer and worship.

We need to know more about you to help you find a ministry.
contact_your_supervisor_message:
Contact your supervisor and ask to add you to your ministries.

As soon as you are added, your ministries will appear here.
onboarding_title:
Welcome to Gideons!

We're a community of prayer and worship.

already_gideon_message: If you already are a Gideon or would like to be one, click on the button bellow to start an application for joining your ministries.
